content:
Without looking at the docs, which of the standard categories in mathlib (Ab etc) do you think have an instance of docs#CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms ? Once you've guessed, you're allowed to look :-)

I was wondering whether Grp had these, that's why I looked.
There is docs#CategoryTheory.Preadditive.preadditiveHasZeroMorphisms so the answer is probably a lot?
Oh you're totally right, I don't know what I was doing wrong, I couldn't #synth it for Ab and then became convinced that it wasn't there despite the fact that it must be there.
Kevin Buzzard has marked this topic as resolved.
